name: Talent com
description: Talent.com's mission is to centralize all jobs available on the web, whether they come from companies'
business_objectives: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Headline: Your job search starts here
ShortDescription: With over 30 million jobs available in over 75 countries, Talent.com has established itself as one of the largest sources of employment worldwide.
enhanced_description: Talent.com is a global job search platform and aggregator that centralizes over 30 million job listings from various companies across more than 75 countries, aiming to be one of the largest sources of employment worldwide. It supports job seekers with features like customized career advice, career advancement resources, and general job hunting assistance. For employers, Talent.com helps in recruiting top talent faster and more efficiently, focusing on improving hiring speed and overall recruiting efficiency through talent sourcing.
key_use_cases: Global job search and aggregation for job seekers
Providing customized career advice and advancement resources to job seekers
Assisting job seekers in the job hunting process
Improving hiring speed and efficiency for employers
competitive_advantages: Extensive global job database with over 30 million jobs
Presence in over 75 countries, establishing it as a large global source of employment
Centralizes job listings from various companies across the web, offering comprehensiveness
Offers value-added services for job seekers, including career advice and advancement support
